title: Ashes
description: A collection of 6 stories by award-winning author Scott Nicholson, including "Scarecrow Boy," "Dog Person" and "You'll Never Walk Alone." From the author of THE RED CHURCH, THEY HUNGER, and the story collections FLOWERS and THE FIRST.Exclusive introduction by Jonathan Maberry, author of THE DRAGON FACTORY and GHOST ROAD BLUES. The afterword explains where the ideas for the stories came from.
author: Scott Nicholson
